extendedIngredients.name: fresh mixed herbs

title: Sautéed Shredded Brussels Sprouts With Fresh Herbs & Crisp Shal
summary: Sautéed Shredded Brussels Sprouts With Fresh Herbs & Crisp Shal is a gluten free and vegetarian side dish. For 97 cents per serving, this recipe covers 15% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 6 servings with 135 calories, 5g of protein, and 9g of fat each. If you have low-salt chicken broth, kosher salt and pepper, garlic, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. 30 people have tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 66%. This score is solid. Similar recipes include Smoky, Lemony Sautéed Shredded Brussels Sprouts, Sautéed Shredded Brussels Sprouts with Smoked Ham and Toasted Pecans, and Shredded Brussels Sprouts Salad.
